articles.author: Alasdair Fotheringham
articles.title: Ineos wary of 'volatile' Tour de France and control Thibaut Pinot on stage 11 - Cyclingnews
articles.description: ‘We were working to stop him getting back in on GC’ says sports director Cummings
articles.content:
The presence of Ineos Grenadiers on the front late on stage 11 of the Tour de France was to keep Thibaut Pinot (Groupama-FDJ) from getting back into contention on GC, team management explained.
Part… [+3801 chars]
